thread.title: Well-located, small Paris Hotel -
thread.title_full: Well-located, small Paris Hotel - Review of Hotel Vic Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: randkthai
title: Well-located, small Paris Hotel -
text:
The Hotel Vic Eiffel is a comfortable, small hotel in an area (Montparnasse) of Paris, very well-located and within walking distance from some of the major tourist attractions south of the Seine. It's also a stone's throw away from stations on the 2 metro lines which quickly transport you to all other areas of the city. Service was very friendly and accommodating, and all staff had a good command of English. Disappointments were relatively minor, namely: only 1 English-speaking channel (CNN) and the breakfast ('full' at 15 Euros and 'Express' at 8 Euros) which I thought were rather expensive for the food offered. You would probably get a better deal at one of the nearby bistros. Recommended!
